title: A high-entropy layered P2-type cathode with high stability for sodium-ion batteries
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01597A, Paper
Hongfeng Liu, Yingshuai Wang, Xiangyu Ding, Yusong Wang, Feng Wu, Hongcai Gao
The configuration entropy is increased by substitution of beryllium and magnesium for nickel. And sodium-ion diffusion rate and cycling performance at high rates were improved with the co-doping strategy.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
